abstract: Wells Fargo settled a case with the S.E.C. involving asset-backed commercial paper that it sold to nonprofit groups, local governments and other investors. The agency said the bank sold troubled mortgage investments without fully researching the products or disclosing the risks.
snippet: Wells Fargo settled a case with the S.E.C. involving asset-backed commercial paper that it sold to nonprofit groups, local governments and other investors. The agency said the bank sold troubled mortgage investments without fully researching the p...
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo on Tuesday settled accusations that it sold troubled mortgage investments without fully researching the products or disclosing the risks to customers.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Settles Mortgage-Crisis Case for $6.5 Million
